maxdb_more_results

maxdb::more_results

(PECL maxdb >= 1.0)

maxdb_more_results -- maxdb::more_results — Check if there any more query results from a multi query

说明

maxdb_more_results ( resource $link ) : bool

maxdb_more_results() indicates if one or more result sets are available from a previous call to maxdb_multi_query().

返回值

Always FALSE.

范例

See maxdb_multi_query().

参见

  • maxdb_multi_query() - Performs a query on the database
  • maxdb_next_result() - Prepare next result from multi_query
  • maxdb_store_result() - Transfers a result set from the last query
  • maxdb_use_result() - Initiate a result set retrieval
